generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A paved area alongside the road with pedestrians walking, bordered by a curb.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including a large brick building on the right and other structures in the background.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign is visible on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road.
- bus: A white tram (a type of bus for public transport) is visible on the tracks.
- train: The tram is a type of train on rails.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked along the sidewalk.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible.
- truck: No trucks are visible.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the road.
